snippet: The authorities crushed a prison riot on Friday using stun grenades and tear gas, injuring at least 40 people, human rights groups said.
abstract: Human rights group says Bahrain authorities crushed prison riot on island of Muharraq using stun grenades and tear gas, injuring at least 40 people.
lead_paragraph: The authorities crushed a prison riot on Friday using stun grenades and tear gas, injuring at least 40 people, human rights groups said.

headline.main: Bahrain: Police Put Down Prison Riot On Island, Injuring at Least 40 People
headline.print_headline: Bahrain: Police Put Down Prison Riot On Island, Injuring at Least 40 People
